loginForm.title: Hi, Welcome!
loginForm.message: Sign in to access your account.
loginForm.useDifferentAccount: Sign in with a different account

reset.title: Reset your password
reset.message: OTP has been confirmed. Please set your new password.

change.title: Update your password
change.message: Please enter current password and set your new password.

resetPasswordForm.title: Forgot password
resetPasswordForm.message: We'll send you an OTP to reset your password through email.
resetPasswordForm.dontHaveEmail: If you don't have an email associated with your account, please contact HR.

errors.title: Error: Login Failed
errors.default: We couldn't find your ID or your password doesn't match
errors.credentials-dont-match: We couldn't find your ID or your password doesn't match
errors.expired-credentials: Your Password has not been updated for last 6 months, Please reset your password
errors.new-password-required: You need to set up a password.
errors.internal-error: Something went wrong. Please submit a ticket
